channel.title: Little Assistance Please [Using Sounds and Music]
channel.description: Well, today I started adding sounds to my server! Yes, very happy indeed. Yet I wanted to add music as well, but I don't know how to. I know i have to declare an area, and use the correct frames. I have those done, but the problem I'm having is making the music play. I have tried fixing multiple times, each time a fail. So can anyone help me?

item.title: Little Assistance Please [Using Sounds and Music]
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

I don’t want to have action buttons sending for music. I simply have it so if you in the area it plays the song. I still haven’t perfected it yet.

Read full topic
item.source: Little Assistance Please [Using Sounds and Music]

item.title: Little Assistance Please [Using Sounds and Music]

item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

make your server send the packet when they click the button for the music.

Read full topic

@wolfs_goal wrote:

Well, today I started adding sounds to my server! Yes, very happy indeed. Yet I wanted to add music as well, but I don’t know how to. I know i have to declare an area, and use the correct frames. I have those done, but the problem I’m having is making the music play. I have tried fixing multiple times, each time a fail. So can anyone help me?
